tool_description: Initializes and configures a real-time audio stream connection with specified parameters for live transcription processing.

stream_url.description: URL or identifier of the audio stream source

channels.description: Number of audio channels (1 for mono, 2 for stereo)

error_messages: Invalid stream URL: Provide a valid audio stream URL or identifier that is accessible.
Unsupported sample rate: Use one of [8000, 16000, 44100, 48000] Hz.
Invalid channel count: Channels must be 1 (mono) or 2 (stereo).
Unsupported bit depth: Use 16, 24, or 32 bit depth.
Stream connection failed: Unable to establish connection to the audio stream source.
usage: Provide stream_url and sample_rate as required parameters. Optionally specify channels and bit_depth. Returns a stream handle and configuration details for downstream processing.

stream_handle.description: Unique identifier for the initialized audio stream

actual_sample_rate.description: Confirmed sample rate of the stream

stream_status.description: Current status of the stream connection
